name: Grumpy Vegetables VR
description:
Throw vegetables on your enemies and their structures to defeat them. Use the special abilities of your vegetables to destroy everything!

Made for the Quest 1 & 2, using Godot and OpenXR. Mostly made live at https://twitch.tv/mreliptik

How to play

Use your controllers to grab and throw the vegetable

  • Index trigger (left and right) to grab a vegetable
  • Grip trigger to use the vegetable special ability
Installation 

To install, use SideQuest and the "install apk" button.
